title: 2 cryptocurrencies set for massive unlocks to avoid trading this week
title_zh: 本周应避免交易的两种将大规模解锁的加密货币
summary_en: Finbold warns traders about two major token unlocks this week that could add selling pressure: Solana (SOL) will unlock 502,930 SOL (~$121.22M, 0.09% of circulating supply), and Official Trump (TRUMP) will unlock 4.89M TRUMP ($58.82M, ~1.52% of circulating supply). The piece notes that unlocks often weigh on near-term prices, with impact varying by market conditions. It cites spot prices at press time (SOL ~$236; TRUMP ~$8.57) but stresses broader sentiment also matters.
summary_zh: Finbold 提醒本周有两项大额代币解锁，或对价格形成抛压：Solana（SOL）将解锁 502,930 枚 SOL（约 1.2122 亿美元，约占流通量 0.09%）；Official Trump（TRUMP）将解锁 489 万枚 TRUMP（约 5,882 万美元，约占流通量 1.52%）。文章强调，代币解锁常在短期内压制价格，其影响还取决于当时的整体市场情绪，并给出发稿时的现价（SOL 约 236 美元；TRUMP 约 8.57 美元）。
best_quote_en: While intended to stagger supply and prevent shocks, they often weigh on prices in the short term.
best_quote_zh: 虽然解锁旨在分散供应、避免冲击，但它们常会在短期内压低价格。

title: Kraken ETH Withdrawal: A Massive $102.2M Transfer Unveiled
title_zh: Kraken 以太坊提现：1.022 亿美元巨额转出
summary_en: The article reports a large withdrawal from Kraken: a newly activated wallet moved 21,925 ETH (~$102.24M) off the exchange, flagged by on-chain analytics firm Onchain Lens. It outlines possible explanations (institutional buy, whale movement, or internal operations) and discusses potential—but not guaranteed—market impacts of such transfers. The piece also explains how on-chain data helps track unusual flows and why context matters more than any single transaction.
summary_zh: 文章称，一笔来自 Kraken 的巨额提现引发关注：一个新启用的钱包从交易所转出 21,925 枚 ETH（约 1.0224 亿美元），由链上分析机构 Onchain Lens 监测到。文中给出可能原因（机构建仓、巨鲸调仓、或交易所内部操作），并强调此类转账对市场的影响并非必然，需结合更广泛的行情与情绪解读。同时介绍了链上数据对识别异常资金流的价值。
best_quote_en: This single Kraken ETH withdrawal amounted to 21,925 ETH, which translates to a staggering $102.24 million at the time of the transaction.
best_quote_zh: 这笔来自 Kraken 的单笔 ETH 提现共计 21,925 枚，以当时价格折合约 1.0224 亿美元。

title: Long Wait for Ether Profits as Exit Queue Surges to Record 45 Days
title_zh: 以太坊赎回队列创纪录达 45 天，获利等待时间拉长
summary_en: Ethereum’s validator exit queue has climbed to a record ~45 days after spiking to about 2.6M ETH. The surge coincides with ETH revisiting >$4,700 and is attributed to profit-taking and validator rebalancing; Kiln Finance’s mass withdrawal tied to a security incident also contributed. CryptoQuant notes staking inflows remain robust, entry queue is ~600k ETH, and exchange inflows of unstaked ETH are moderate—suggesting limited immediate sell pressure unless inflows accelerate. ETH hovered near ~$4,550 at press time, ~6.5% below the Aug 24 ATH of $4,946.
summary_zh: 以太坊验证者退出队列升至历史新高，赎回等待约 45 天，队列规模一度达约 260 万枚 ETH。该现象与 ETH 再度上探 4,700 美元有关，主要由获利了结与验证者再平衡驱动；同时，因安全事件引发的 Kiln Finance 大额提现也推高了队列。CryptoQuant 指出，质押流入仍稳健，进入队列约 60 万枚 ETH，且被赎回的 ETH 流入交易所并不显著——除非交易所净流入激增，短期抛压或有限。发稿时 ETH 在约 4,550 美元一线，距离 8 月 24 日 4,946 美元历史高点约差 6.5%。
best_quote_en: The Ethereum exit queue is at its highest ever waiting time, with a whopping 45 days to unstake the asset.
best_quote_zh: 以太坊退出队列的等待时间创下历史新高——赎回需要长达 45 天。

title: pump.fun Captures 90.6% of Solana Launchpad Market Share — Jupiter Data (Sept 15)
title_zh: pump.fun 占据 90.6% Solana 发射台市场份额——Jupiter 数据（9月15日）
summary_en: A 24-hour snapshot from Jupiter’s Data Dashboard shows strong concentration in Solana launchpads: pump.fun leads with 90.6% market share, followed by Letsbonk (5.18%) and Believe (1.66%). The piece stresses these are short-term rankings and urges considering liquidity and concentration when assessing token launch dynamics.
summary_zh: Jupiter 数据面板的 24 小时快照显示 Solana 发射台市场高度集中：pump.fun 以 90.6% 份额居首，Letsbonk 占 5.18%，Believe 占 1.66%。文章提醒这是短期排名，应结合流动性与集中度评估代币发行生态。
best_quote_en: pump.fun held the leading position with 90.6% of market share.
best_quote_zh: pump.fun 以 90.6% 的市场份额位居第一。

title: Bitcoin Stagnation Explained: Whales Profit-Take in $115K–$125K Zone
title_zh: 比特币为何停滞：巨鲸在 11.5万–12.5 万美元区间获利了结
summary_en: CryptoPotato reports BTC is stuck between $115k–$125k as whales have sold 116,000 BTC ($13B) over the past 30 days—the largest dump since July 2022. Analyst Doctor Profit identifies that band as a key profit-taking zone; meanwhile spot Bitcoin ETF inflows cooled to ~500 BTC/day, leaving insufficient absorption to power a breakout. Despite macro headlines, BTC has mostly moved sideways, with 7-day trading between ~$110,870 and ~$116,705 and capital rotating to alts (e.g., PEPE, DOGE).
summary_zh: 报道称，比特币在 11.5 万–12.5 万美元区间横盘，过去 30 天巨鲸抛售约 11.6 万枚 BTC（约 130 亿美元），为自 2022 年 7 月以来最大规模。分析师 Doctor Profit 将该区间视为主要获利了结带；现货比特币 ETF 日均净流入降至约 500 枚 BTC，吸收能力不足以推动突破。尽管有宏观消息面扰动，BTC 近一周基本横盘（~11.087 万–11.6705 万美元），部分资金转向山寨币（如 PEPE、DOGE）。
best_quote_en: Whales sold 116K BTC ($13B) in 30 days, the largest dump since July 2022.
best_quote_zh: 过去30天巨鲸抛售11.6万枚BTC（约130亿美元），为自2022年7月以来最大。
